When the game is in landscape mode, the palm of your hand can easily block the ambient light sensor, which causes the screen brightness to change frequently. It is recommended to turn on the brightness lock function. You can also choose to open the game in portrait mode.

Games running in Flat panel mode will be automatically closed after you exit the game space

Since the tablet mode is a special game play method, in order to ensure a better gaming experience, currently only horizontal screen games in the game space are supported.

In order to ensure a better gaming experience, the tablet mode currently only supports horizontal screen games in the game space. Games in the game space will be automatically added to the tablet mode. You can remove or add to the game list in the tablet mode settings.
By clicking the icon in the upper right corner of the game card, you can switch the game frame ratio. After switching, you need to restart the game to take effect.
The following games will support tablet mode
· Obtain mobile phone information: Used to acquire and collect IMEI numbers to distinguish different devices;
· Read/write mobile phone storage: Used to download and update games, or edit user avatar;
· Obtain system account information: Used to use the login via Black Shark account in apps;

The tablet mode is a gameplay method to obtain a larger game field of vision by changing the game frame ratio. At the same time, a virtual controller module is added, which has a unique game control experience. The virtual handle module can freely adjust the number and position of virtual buttons, as well as the touch mode; the game screen can freely map functions according to the number of virtual buttons.
Since the tablet mode is a special game play method, in order to ensure a better gaming experience and avoid function conflicts, the following functions cannot be used in the tablet mode:
Tilt and pull inwards at the corner of the screen
Tilt and pull inwards at the corner of the screen to call out
Long press any icon in Game Assistant to adjust the button layout
Recommended games in the game lobby
Welfare recommendation in the game lobby
%s successfully installed and added to the game space

Improve the network connection priority of game apps on the carrier side to reduce delay in case of network congestion. It is valid in games only. The acceleration service is automatically stopped in 8 hours after it is enabled the first time each day. Before it is started, make sure that the corresponding SIM card has been set to a default mobile data card, and the current network mode is 4G. In the case of first-time start, spend about 1 minute to register the service, during which, network may be disconnected temporarily. This function must be used with a king card (Black Shark Version).
Entry for Applying for King Card Games (Black Shark Version)

The game space provides players with a full range of services such as game downloads, guide videos, game configuration, game management, and peripheral management.
The game space provides players with a full range of services such as guide videos, game configuration, game management, and peripheral management.
Both global settings and personalized configurations are simple, clear, and easy-to-learn.
Settings are easy to understand and set
"The flat panel mode, speed mode and other new game innovation experience, once you get started, you can't put it down."

It automatically selects the acceleration mode according to the network environment to achieve better acceleration effects

This function is used specially for the king card (Black Shark Version), and open free of charge for 8 hours per day currently. After the trial period, the service may be adjusted. For details about the game acceleration service problems of Unicom, follow the official account of \"King Card Assistant\" for consultation. Before using this function, confirm that the corresponding SIM card has been set to a default mobile data card, and the current network mode is 4G. In the case of first-time start, spend about 1 minute to register the service, during which, network may be disconnected temporarily.

With Ramdisk disk acceleration technology, applications are directly installed and run in RAM memory, which saves the time of loading data from disk to memory when the application is running, and greatly improves application read and write speed.
You can give the voice command to the phone to complete operations directly. For example, they can adjust common game features, brightness, sound, etc. Enable it now?

The anti-misoperation functions of full screen gesture and navigation button are required, while the others are optional.
After entering the game, turn on Anti-Mistaken Touch from the game assistant, The effective range is determined by the above options.

The extreme speed mode significantly improves the reading and writing speed of application data, and effectively improves the startup and running acceleration speed of the game after it is turned on, and enhances the game experience. The actual revenue varies with different games and different scenarios.The test results are for reference only.

During the use of the game space, you need to connect to the Internet and read the contact permissions, and you need to associate the use permissions of Game Center, Black Shark Moment, and Black Shark Equipment Box at the same time. All permissions are as follows:

During the use of the game space, you need to connect to the Internet and read the contact permissions, and you need to associate the use permissions of Black Shark Moment and Black Shark Equipment Box at the same time. All permissions are as follows:

During the use of the game space, you need to connect to the Internet and read the contact permissions, and you need to associate the use permissions of Black Shark Equipment Box at the same time. All permissions are as follows:

If you do not agree to call the above necessary permissions, or do not agree to our collection and use of the above information, it will cause the game space, the game center, the black shark moment, and the black shark equipment box to not operate normally, you can choose to exit the application or go to the system Settings>Permission Management turn off authorization to terminate the service.

If you do not agree to call the above necessary permissions, or do not agree to our collection and use of the above information, it will cause the game space, the black shark moment, and the black shark equipment box to not operate normally, you can choose to exit the application or go to the system Settings>Permission Management turn off authorization to terminate the service.

If you do not agree to call the above necessary permissions, or do not agree to our collection and use of the above information, it will cause the game space and the black shark equipment box to not operate normally, you can choose to exit the application or go to the system Settings>Permission Management turn off authorization to terminate the service.

Start game space through screen pressure sensor: Enter the game space quickly by pressing both sides of the screen with two fingers when the phone is unlocked and the screen is turned on (for scenarios other than games)

Start game space through magnetic levitation buttons: Enter the game space instantly by raising and pressing the left and right magnetic levitation buttons at the same time for about 0.5 seconds when the phone is unlocked and the screen is turned on (for scenarios other than games)
The following shortcut settings only take effect in games
A game removed from the shark space is not uninstalled from the desktop.
The new aspect ratio will take effect after restarting the game
Will restore all settings in the gamer studio to initial status immediately. The operation is irrevocable.
Restore all settings in the gamer studio to initial status immediately
Switch back the Shark button to cancel the operation
Disable the gesture of [taking a screenshot with three fingers]
Enabled games will be displayed on the home page of the shark space, and the [Game Assistant] can be used
・ Obtain mobile phone identification information: Used to identify and distinguish different users through identification information;
・ Obtain location information: For fast connection of devices and peripheral discovery;
・ Read/write mobile phone storage: For downloading and updating games, and storing necessary data storage;
・ Obtain the list of apps: Used to search and add games;
・ Read call records: Used to remind users of important information;
・ Read contact information: Used to enable users to call back;
・ Read/write mobile phone storage: Used to store necessary data storage;

"*Shark Time records wonderful killing moments during game, with a low refresh rate, to get a better experience of the game temperature rise. *AI recording function is not supported in flat panel mode."
・ Obtain phone status and identity: Obtain the phone’s IMEI number
・ Read/write mobile phone storage: Read/write mobile phone storage
・ Find the account on the device: Obtain the phone account to log in;
Enabling the recording function will slightly increase the power consumption and temperature

To complete the command correctly, players need to say %1$s + command event, and say the specific command within 2 seconds after they say %2$s. n Prepositions can help to increase the success rate of commands and reduce the rate of misrecognitions.
Say %s + command event to the phone
Connect your Black Shark mobile phone through the Fun Play Projection client to use the computer keyboard and mouse to play games on your phone
1. Download and install the Fun Play Projection PC client and connect the phone to the SS port on the PC through a USB3.0 cable, then open Fun Play Projection client to mirror the phone to the PC;

"2. After opening the game on the Black Shark mobile phone, the PC keyboard and mouse buttons are mapped to the function keys of the mobile game through the Fun Play Projection, then you can use the keyboard and mouse to play games; The current version does not support simultaneously using the mapping function of other peripherals;"
3. You can also use Fun Play Projection to watch videos or browse contents on the big screen

"Note: 1.After the screencast is turned on, USB debugging will be automatically closed due to mutual exclusion of functions 2. When closing the screencasting (client), please disconnect the data cable at the same time to restore the phone to normal use mode 3. The Fun Play Projection (PC) client only supports Windows 10 and above operation system versions 4. The Fun Play Projection (Mobile) only supports Tencent Black Shark Game Phone 3S 5. The current mobile mirroring transmission parameter of Changwan Screen is 60 Hz@720P 6.The USB3.0 data cable needs to be purchased separately, and the bundled cable cannot be used for screen projection temporarily"
Disable the virtual navigation bar to pop up

The Game Space mode allows players to give the voice command to the phone to complete operations directly. For example, they can adjust common game features, brightness, sound, etc. It relieves stress and facilitates game control.
另外，使用前置词可以提高指令的成功率以及降低误识别率。
After it is enabled, the top speaker will be disabled temporarily to improve the voice call quality when voice chat is initiated during a game
